title: Waitlist
management_description: Manage waitlist requests. Users are ordered by priority and request time. When a resource becomes available, you can notify and automatically assign the first in queue.
filter_by_resource_desc: Select a specific resource to view its waitlist
step_1_desc: They are automatically added to the waitlist with their position in the queue.
step_2_desc: URGENT > HIGH > NORMAL > LOW, with request time as the secondary criterion.
step_3_desc: The system automatically notifies the first in queue (#1).
step_4_desc: If accepted, the reservation is created. If declined or no response within 24h, the next person (#2) is notified.
confirm_cancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this waitlist entry?
